{{Description|According to the legends of another land, the world will someday be crushed by two great wind wheels. Xiao's mastery over polearms is transcendent, ripping his foes apart like those legendary wind wheels.}}
'''Lemniscatic Wind Cycling''' is [[Xiao]]'s [[Elemental Skill]].

==Gameplay Notes==
* {{TalentNote|particles|3}}
** No elemental particles are generated while the Elemental Burst [[Bane of All Evil]] is active.
* {{TalentNote|icd|Skill DMG|0.1}}
* A plunging attack can be performed immediately after using this skill, regardless of Xiao's altitude.
* {{TalentNote|character=Xiao|talent=Lemniscatic Wind Cycling|ascension|2|Dissolution Eon: Heaven Fall}}

;<big>Constellation Effects</big>
* {{TalentNote|constellation|1|Dissolution Eon: Destroyer of Worlds}}
* {{TalentNote|constellation|3|Conqueror of Evil: Wrath Deity}}
* {{TalentNote|constellation|6|Conqueror of Evil: Guardian Yaksha}}

==Trivia==
*Some other characters in the game feature attacks similar to Xiao's wind cycling. For example, in the [[Enter the Golden House]] challenge, when [[Childe]] enters his [[Delusion]] phase, he will sometimes perform several Electro cycling dash attacks similar to Xiao's. Moreover, the [[Fatui Pyro Agent]] will sometimes perform a quick lunge attack similar to Xiao's wind cycling.
